item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!
Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go snow shoeing, on the trails at Audubon Society Massabesic Trails. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way. This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout. I thought that we would enjoy nature for about two hours, with a few breaks/stops along the trail. So come and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of friends.
We will meet at 2:00 pm in the parking lot off of the Audubon Center.
DIRECTIONS: Directions to Trailhead
1. From I-93 and points west and north and south of Manchester, take Exit 7 to Route 101 East (Seacoast). Watch for the Audubon signs.
2. From points east of Manchester, go west towards Manchester on Route 101. Watch for the Audubon signs.
3. Take Exit 1 and go south onto Route 28 By-pass. Travel 1/8 miles to the traffic circle.
4. Proceed half way through the circle, continuing on the Route 28 By-pass. You'll see Lake Massabesic on your left.
5. Travel 1.9 miles to Spofford Road. Turn left onto Spofford Road for 1/4 mile.
6. Turn left onto Audubon Way (on the corner as Spofford Road veers right).
7. The parking lot is on the left, opposite the Center.
Close by places for snowshoe rentals are: America's Stonehenge, 105 Haverhill St, Salem NH Phone# 603-893-8300 or Beaver Brook Assn, 117 Ridge Rd, Hollis NH Phone # 603-465-7787.

Notes on Difficulty Rating
The trails are generally flat.

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails.
If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at a nearby restaurant. I hope to see you there.

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meetup sign.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Snowshoeing on the Audubon Society Massabesic Trails
